text: Yest' i takiye, kotoryye sovershili grekhi (naprimer, uklonyalis' ot srazheniya vo imya Allakha), no ne byli litsemerami. Vozmezdiye etim otlozheno do poveleniya Allakha: On ili ikh nakazhet, ili primet pokayaniye u nikh i prostit ikh. Ved' Allakh znayet ikh sostoyaniye i vedayet taynoye ikh serdets. On mudr v Svoyom nakazanii i nagrazhdenii Svoikh rabov
